surescripts.content:
• Developed a full-stack web application for Surescripts to improve and automate the customer upgrade process
  • Used tools such as Angular, C#, and Oracle to gather customer responses and save them in a database
  • Developed software using Agile methodology and version-control software

marquette.content:
• Worked with a team of undergraduates and graduate students to research algorithmic bias in crime mapping
  • Presented research at a poster session with other researchers and Marquette faculty
